com.qtplaf.library.database

Class RecordSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.RecordSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Record>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataRecordSet, PageRecordSet

    public class RecordSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Record>
    A RecordSet packs a list of records.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
